statements: SELECT * FROM media_files;
SELECT media_id, file_name, file_type, file_size, created_at FROM media_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size, created_at, media_id FROM media_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM media_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, file_type, created_at FROM media_files ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT media_id, file_name FROM media_files WHERE file_type = 'image' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM media_files WHERE file_size > 100000 ORDER BY file_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT media_id, file_name, file_size FROM media_files WHERE file_type = 'video' OR file_type = 'audio' ORDER BY file_size DESC, created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT media_id, file_name, file_type FROM media_files ORDER BY media_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT media_id, file_type, COUNT(*) AS total_files FROM media_files GROUP BY file_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_files DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles;
SELECT media_id, file_name FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, upload_date FROM MediaFiles ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM MediaTags WHERE tag_id = 2;
SELECT file_size, file_name FROM MediaFiles WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles WHERE media_id = 100;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_size > 500;
SELECT file_name, upload_date FROM MediaFiles ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_size BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT m.file_name, mt.tag_name FROM MediaFiles m INNER JOIN MediaTags mt ON m.media_id = mt.media_id;
SELECT * FROM media_files;
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM media_files WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT file_name, file_type, upload_date FROM media_files ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_type, tag_name FROM media_files JOIN media_tags ON media_files.file_id = media_tags.file_id JOIN tags ON media_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id;
SELECT file_name, file_type, upload_date FROM media_files WHERE file_type = 'image';
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM media_files WHERE upload_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM media_files WHERE file_type = 'image' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size, upload_date FROM media_files JOIN media_tags ON media_files.file_id = media_tags.file_id WHERE media_tags.tag_id = 1;

SELECT tags.tag_name, media_files.file_name FROM media_tags JOIN tags ON media_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id JOIN media_files ON media_tags.file_id = media_files.file_id ORDER BY media_files.upload_date ASC;
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(file_id) AS file_count FROM tags JOIN media_tags ON tags.tag_id = media_tags.tag_id GROUP BY tag_name HAVING file_count > 1 ORDER BY file_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles
SELECT file_name, file_type FROM MediaFiles
SELECT file_id, file_name, file_size FROM MediaFiles
SELECT file_id, file_path, created_at FROM MediaFiles
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM Tags
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles LIMIT 5;
SELECT file_name, file_type, file_size FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_type = 'image' ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT file_id, file_name, created_at FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_name LIKE '%cat%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT m.file_name, t.tag_name FROM MediaFiles m JOIN MediaTags mt ON m.file_id = mt.file_id JOIN Tags t ON mt.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'nature' ORDER BY m.created_at DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT c.category_name FROM Categories c JOIN MediaFiles m ON m.file_id = m.file_id JOIN MediaTags mt ON m.file_id = mt.file_id JOIN Tags t ON mt.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'technology';
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_type = 'image';
SELECT file_name, file_size FROM MediaFiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT file_name, created_at FROM MediaFiles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT m.file_name, t.tag_name FROM MediaFiles m JOIN MediaTags mt ON m.id = mt.media_id JOIN Tags t ON mt.tag_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_type = 'image' ORDER BY file_size DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size, file_type FROM MediaFiles WHERE file_size > 1000 AND created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;

SELECT Users.username, Tags.tag_name FROM Users JOIN MediaOwnership ON Users.user_id = MediaOwnership.user_id JOIN MediaTags ON MediaOwnership.media_id = MediaTags.media_id JOIN Tags ON MediaTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id WHERE Users.username LIKE 'john%' AND Tags.tag_name = 'nature';

SELECT MediaFiles.file_name, Tags.tag_name FROM MediaFiles JOIN MediaTags ON MediaFiles.id = MediaTags.media_id JOIN Tags ON MediaTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id WHERE Tags.tag_name IN ('forest', 'mountain') ORDER BY MediaFiles.created_at DESC;

SELECT Users.username, COUNT(MediaOwnership.media_id) AS media_count FROM Users JOIN MediaOwnership ON Users.user_id = MediaOwnership.user_id GROUP BY Users.username HAVING COUNT(MediaOwnership.media_id) > 5 ORDER BY media_count DESC;
